entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Local blowing snow. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 18.
